instructions.name: Step 1
instructions.manual: Put flour, 30g sugar, vanilla sugar, butter, baking powder and egg into a bowl and knead the dough.

instructions.name: Step 2
instructions.manual: Put 1/3 of the dough into the freezer. Put the rest of the dough on a baking tray and bake for 12 minutes in the oven at 180 degrees.

instructions.name: Step 3
instructions.manual: Grate apples, sprinkle with lemon juice and mix. Put in a pan, pour 2 tablespoons of water. Add sugar, cinnamon and mix. Fry until evaporation. Cool it.

instructions.name: Step 4
instructions.manual: Put the apples on the baked dough. Grate the rest of the dough and sprinkle with almond flakes. Bake 45 minutes at 175 degrees.

instructions.name: Step 5
instructions.manual: Your apple cake is ready. Enjoy!

instructions.name: Step 1
instructions.manual: Whip the egg whites with a pinch of salt. After 3 minutes, start adding sugar gradually. Add lemon juice and potato starch and whip a few more minutes.

instructions.name: Step 2
instructions.manual: Make a circle with whipped egg whites on the baking sheet and put in the oven preheated to 150 degrees. After 7 minutes, reduce the temperature to 110 degrees and dry it for 100 minutes. After baking, leave it in the oven for next 30 minutes.

instructions.name: Step 3
instructions.manual: Whip the cream with 2 tablespoons sugar.

instructions.name: Step 5
instructions.manual: Take meringue from the oven, put the whipped cream on the top and pour over the raspberry mousse.
